summary.span: 命名空間包含支援 SQL Server 特定功能的類別。

span.span: The namespace contains classes that support SQL Server-specific functionality.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需此命名空間內的類別支援的功能資訊，請參閱[列舉執行個體的 SQL Server (ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/enumerating-instances-of-sql-server.md)和[SQL Server 中的查詢通知](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/query-notifications-in-sql-server.md)。For information about the functionality that the classes within this namespace support, see [Enumerating Instances of SQL Server (ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/enumerating-instances-of-sql-server.md) and [Query Notifications in SQL Server](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/query-notifications-in-sql-server.md). > [!NOTE] > 在 beta 版的 ADO.NET 2.0 版中，命名空間也包含用於 SQL Server common language runtime (CLR) 整合的類別。In beta releases of ADO.NET version 2.0, the namespace also contained classes for use with SQL Server common language runtime (CLR) integration. 不過，這些類別已移到自己的命名空間。However, those classes have been moved into their own namespace, . 如需有關如何使用 SQL Server CLR 整合的詳細資訊，請參閱[SQL Server Common Language Runtime 整合](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/sql-server-common-language-runtime-integration.md)。For more information about using SQL Server CLR integration, see [SQL Server Common Language Runtime Integration](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/sql-server-common-language-runtime-integration.md).
